thread.title: Dad Cracks Up When He Sees How Mom Tries To Sneak Out Of Son’s Bedroom Without Waking Him Up

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Dad Cracks Up When He Sees How Mom Tries To Sneak Out Of Son’s Bedroom Without Waking Him Up
text:
Dad Cracks Up When He Sees How Mom Tries To Sneak Out Of Son’s Bedroom Without Waking Him Up   
It can be tricky business putting down babies for bed-time. They might wake up and start complaining or crying when you try to leave the room. That’s Caryn Chelin Morris has become a very stealthy mom. But her husband didn’t realize how sneaky she was until he saw her on their home’s surveillance cameras. And when he did he couldn’t stop laughing. 
He writes, “The best thing about having cameras in your house is watching your wife trying to exit the room after putting your son down!! Sometimes you have to use your initiative for your exit!!” As the couple live in South Africa, he added, “PS The SA Army are calling me for you [Caryn] to do training on the reverse leopard crawl!” 
Note: video make take a few seconds to load. 
Watch the hilarious video below and share it with your friends!
